subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The doctor for Lute Olson, the former Arizona coach, said that Olson had a stroke within the last year and that he advised him to retire. Dr. Steven Knope said a magnetic resonance imaging test confirmed the stroke, which left Olson with severe depression and impaired judgment. ¶The police in Hamden, Conn., said they were investigating complaints of racism at Quinnipiac University, including slurs and harassing phone calls directed at black players on the basketball team. Police said slurs were discovered Friday and Saturday on poster and cork boards outside the dormitory rooms of three black players and that players in the same building reported receiving harassing phone calls Monday. racism.
